name: Goku Sim
description: Arrow keys- Move Up Arrow- Jump "s" - Fly if already jumping (if you get stuck in the air after a transformation press "s") To punch press "x" - Is Kamehame Ha ("d" if ssj3) "x" - Is ki blast (ssj3 only) "a" - Is teleport (30 second delay as normal, 15 second delay as ssj, and no delay as ssj3) "T" - To transform between ssj and normal or to power down from ssj3 press To transform to ssj3, you must be flying (bug related) and you must be ssj first, press the "3" key If you use the "4" you will do a "quick" ssj3 transformation. You can be anywhere to do this.
